QuestData.Title: Hour of the Worg
QuestData.Description: It is time, then, $n. Arugal must be defeated.$B$BGet a couple of people you can trust and head for Bloodmoon Isle. It's just off the coast, east of here.$B$BWe'll hit them fast. Take out Arugal's lieutenants -- I'll catch up with you when it's time to take out the monster himself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sasha at the White Pine Trading Post wants you to go to Bloodmoon Isle and slay Selas, Varlam, Goremaw and the Shade of Arugal.
QuestData.RewardText: We got him good, $n. But not good enough.$B$BOne thing's for sure... we won't be seeing him around these parts any longer.
